user_description.ru: Ты бьёшь её плетью, тростью или флоггером по телу — ягодицы, спина, бёдра.
user_description.en: You strike her with whip, cane or flogger on her body — butt, back, thighs.

ai_description.ru: M бьёт F плетью/тростью/флоггером. Требует навыка и доверия. Тест на sadism/masochism dynamic.
ai_description.en: M strikes F with whip/cane/flogger. Requires skill and trust. Tests sadism/masochism dynamic.

image_prompt: woman bent over wooden furniture, man standing behind holding leather flogger raised, red marks on her back and buttocks, dungeon room with stone walls
